subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Responsibility for coordinating open science initiatives in Finland.
goals__remit: The Federation of Finnish Learned Societies, established in 1899, is a national co-operative body for learned societies in Finland. It contributes to the co-operation between learned societies, supports and develops scholarly communication and publishing, and promotes awareness and usage of research results. It also supports and develops the role of its members in science policy discussion.
